text: tame temani sathe yud'dha mate potani sakti pramane taiyari karo ane ghoda'one pana taiyara rakho, jethi tame tena vade allahana ane potana satru'one bhayabhita kari sako ane temana sivaya bija lokone pana, jemane tame nathi janata, allaha ta'ala te'one khuba sari rite jane che, je kami pana allahana margamam kharca karaso, te tamane purepurum apavamam avase ane tamaro adhikara chinavi levamam nahim ave
